overview:
Kevin Acker is a senior business leader with a proven record of leadership and achievement in assessing opportunities and creating new ventures and products in both startups and established companies. With a highly analytical mind, Kevin Acker has the ability to break down complex problems into manageable components and apply the right techniques to solve them.
